articles.title: How Riot Games is fighting the war against video game hackers - TechCrunch
articles.description: Riot’s “anti-cheat artisan” Phillip Koskinas explains how he and his team go after cheaters and cheat developers to protect the integrity of games, such as Valorant and League of Legends.
